value.rock:
**Verse 1**  
Yo, waddlin’ on the ice, lookin’ so fly,  
In my tuxedo suit, I’m the coolest guy,  
From the South Pole chillin’, where the snowflakes fall,  
Got my crew by my side, we’re the kings of it all.  

Slide on the belly, yeah, we’re glidin’ with style,  
Fishin’ in the ocean, we can swim for a mile,  
Dancin’ on the ice, doin’ our little jig,  
With a heart so big, we’re livin’ life big.  

**Chorus**  
Penguins in the house, we’re the icy elite,  
Waddle to the beat, feel the rhythm in your feet,  
From the icebergs to the sea, we’re livin’ so free,  
Penguins on the scene, come and vibe with me!  

**Verse 2**  
Huddled up tight when the winter winds blow,  
Keepin’ it warm, that’s how we roll, yo,  
Parents takin’ turns, watchin’ over the eggs,  
Teamwork makes the dream work, we’re all about the pegs.  

Got my little chicks, they’re the future of the crew,  
Teachin’ ‘em to swim, yeah, that’s what we do,  
From the icy waters to the snowy shores,  
We’re the penguin fam, hear our mighty roars!  

**Chorus**  
Penguins in the house, we’re the icy elite,  
Waddle to the beat, feel the rhythm in your feet,  
From the icebergs to the sea, we’re livin’ so free,  
Penguins on the scene, come and vibe with me!  

**Bridge**  
So if you see us comin’, better step aside,  
We’re the coolest birds, got that penguin pride,  
With our flippers flappin’, we’re the life of the party,  
In this frozen world, we’re livin’ hearty!  

**Outro**  
So raise your flippers high, let’s celebrate,  
Penguin life is good, can’t underestimate,  
From the ice to the sea, we’re the kings of the chill,  
Waddlin’ through life, yeah, we’re keepin’ it real!  

**Chorus**  
Penguins in the house, we’re the icy elite,  
Waddle to the beat, feel the rhythm in your feet,  
From the icebergs to the sea, we’re livin’ so free,  
Penguins on the scene, come and vibe with me!
value.techno:
**Title: "Penguin Groove"**

*(Verse 1)*  
Waddle in the snow, feel the icy flow,  
Black and white suits, ready for the show.  
Dancing on the ice, under the moonlight,  
Penguin party vibes, everything feels right.  

*(Pre-Chorus)*  
Flap your wings, let’s take flight,  
Slide and glide, it’s a chilly night.  
In the frozen land, we’re the kings and queens,  
Living life in rhythm, chasing all our dreams.  

*(Chorus)*  
Penguin groove, feel the beat drop,  
Ice-cold moves, we’ll never stop.  
In the Arctic night, we’re shining bright,  
Penguin love, it’s a wild delight!  

*(Drop)*  
(Techno beat drops)  
Waddle, waddle, slide, slide,  
Feel the bass, let it be your guide.  
Penguin power, we’re alive,  
In this frozen world, we thrive!  

*(Verse 2)*  
Snowflakes falling, hear the music call,  
Gather all around, we’re having a ball.  
From the icebergs high to the ocean deep,  
In this penguin dream, we’ll dance and leap.  

*(Pre-Chorus)*  
Flap your wings, let’s take flight,  
Slide and glide, it’s a chilly night.  
In the frozen land, we’re the kings and queens,  
Living life in rhythm, chasing all our dreams.  

*(Chorus)*  
Penguin groove, feel the beat drop,  
Ice-cold moves, we’ll never stop.  
In the Arctic night, we’re shining bright,  
Penguin love, it’s a wild delight!  

*(Bridge)*  
Under the stars, we’ll twirl and spin,  
With every heartbeat, let the fun begin.  
Together we’ll dance, in this icy trance,  
Join the penguin party, take a chance!  

*(Drop)*  
(Techno beat drops)  
Waddle, waddle, slide, slide,  
Feel the bass, let it be your guide.  
Penguin power, we’re alive,  
In this frozen world, we thrive!  

*(Outro)*  
So come on, friends, let’s unite,  
In the penguin groove, everything’s alright.  
With every beat, we’ll soar and glide,  
In this icy wonderland, we’ll forever ride!  

*(Fade out with techno beats and waddle sounds)*
